name: places/ChIJnYb5Utn3wokRzELD1v8aeFo

displayName.text: Pee Wee Playhouse Group Family Childcare

formattedAddress: 647 W 172nd St, New York, NY 10032, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Pee Wee Playhouse Group Family Childcare

adrFormatAddress: 647 W 172nd St, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: I've been taking my twin boys to Pee Wee Playhouse for a couple of months now and I love the care and attention the staff give my children. They cater to their every need not only in food but in age appropriate activities and even music! I like that the daycare doesn't have a television so I know my children are engaging with the adults and other children constantly. I enjoy all the frequent pictures and videos sent to me via text message. I get to see my boys happily enjoying meal time, engaging in fun activities and playing at a near by park. Not to mention even taking a safe troll on a double stroller like the one I own! The owner Wandi is transparent, easy to communicate with and reasonably felixble. I just heard their services will sometimes be available at night, so parents can schedule an occasional date night! I can't wait to take advantage of it...finding a local evening sitter for 2 is difficult. I see my children growing at Pee Wee Playhouse for the long run. I am beyond satisfied with the service and care Pee Wee offers my children and highly recommend this daycare.

originalText.text: Truly a remarkable find as a first time parent, from the moment I walked in with my son it felt completely right. As i watched him explore with no hesitation and a smile on his face. It had a home feel that is very important to me Wandi has such a warm soul and i feel great joy knowing my children are learning from you and being given the best care.
